"opening txt file, invalid literal for float() just trying to open this data set in txt format...400.,41.7693.403.977686150861,42.68129270405837.408.3434392432695,43.86688321933424.412.61217560029104,45.59966935704514.416.4928450157652,48.72324436844505.420.9556148435605,51.64162102143182.423.86611690516617,53.534005882352936.427.0676691729323,56.2927838121295.431.43342226534077,59.73555626994983.435.31409168081495,60.85274733242134.439.291777831676,64.52351796625626.442.68736357021584,67.25949607843137.446.56803298569,68.92388276333789.450.73975260732476,71.29506379388965.454.7174387581858,72.41225485636114.458.21004123211253,73.68904464204286.462.4787775891341,75.5130300501596.466.6504972107689,76.72142038303693.470.2401164200825,77.72461235750114.473.73271889400917,78.63660506155951.477.61338830948335,79.57139758321932.481.9791414018918,80.64298901048792...when trying to open in.....with open('sundata.txt') as i:.    data = i.read().data = data.split('n').wavedata = [float(row.split()[0]) for row in data].intdata = [float(row.split()[1]) for row in data]...i'm returned with this error,..invalid literal for float(): 400.,41.7693...how do i correct this error?"
